author: vors
body:
:fireworks:

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Per discussion with @lzybkr we are not doing a POSIX-compatible fix (we don't obey HOME variable), but we are doing a more PowerShell-idiomatic fix: equivalent of `(Get-PSProvider FileSystem).Home`

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
- Got offline sign-off from @lzybkr 
- Payload to Travis CI was not delivered and it doesn't have a way to re-deliver it
- Merging this change myself to fix windows build on master

title: Make 'cd' go to the HOME directory
